name: Indefinite Detriment
description:
Indefinite Detriment is an epic 2D Combat game. 

Web GL Version

https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/indefinitedetriment

Controls:

 Arrows to move or navigate the world map.

 Space key to attack. 

Backspace to return to the main menu. 

Mouse is not necessary, but can be used to click menus buttons. 

Random Details that may not be obvious: 

The hypnotic sun has a deflect attack. 

More players are unlocked through beating bosses.
